title: The Rules Require Me To Love You
description:
Description :
        The desire to stick close to her master every day, could it simply be a programmed setting?! A face deliberately designed to resemble her master's old love, was all of this a conspiracy or just a trigger? But! Wu Qing doesn't understand such convoluted matters; she only wants to make her master happy! Even in a post-apocalyptic world ravaged by plagues, she wants to stay close to her master! A loyal and innocent android dog  a frail and aloof researcher cat
